alps.description: geo (pronounced "gee-oh") is a simple format for marking up WGS84 geographic coordinates (latitude and longitude). This ALPS description of geo allows any hypermedia format that supports ALPS to use the geo format.

child.description: A measurement of latitude. This MUST specified in decimal degrees and SHOULD be specified to six decimal places.
A measurement of longitude. This MUST specified in decimal degrees and SHOULD be specified to six decimal places.
